item.title: Commission Implementing Decision (EU) 2019/1004 of 7 June 2019
item.description: Laying down rules for the calculation, verification and reporting of data on waste in accordance with Directive 2008/98/EC(Text with EEA relevance.)

item.title: EU, EEA, EFTA and Schengen countries
EU Waste Framework Directive (WFD)
item.description: Directive 2008/98/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council of 19 November 2008 on waste and repealing certain Directives(Text with EEA relevance). The present directive was adopted on 19 November 2008.
